messages.content:
Classify the company as 'Yes' (investable tech startup) or 'No' for VCs based on its description. Reply only with 'Yes' or 'No'. 

Guidelines: 

Yes: 

    High-growth potential in tech sectors (fintech, healthtech, AI, SaaS, enterprise solutions, etc.)
    Revenue models: subscription, SaaS, marketplaces with fees, monetizable platforms
    Global/large regional reach
    Innovative tech/business models disrupting industries or creating new markets
    Hardware products with large market potential and advanced technology
     

No: 

    Investment firms (inclucing VCs), consultancies, accelerators, large corporations, small traditional businesses, boutiques, advisoriry.
    Limited scalability industries (cannabis, local services, niche markets)
    Unclear business models or limited revenue potential
    Capital-intensive projects or asset management
    Localized focus without expansion options
    Traditional industries without significant innovation
    People-intensive services
    Beverage producers, cannabis/drug industry, gaming studios, NFT creators/sellers
     

Note: Stealth mode startups can be 'Yes' or 'No' based on potential and industry focus. 


Here are some examples as a reference:
Description: Nordam Business Partners is a consulting firm that focuses on sales process services for businesses.
Label: No; 
Description: Seahouse Capital offers capital raising, capital structure, IPO law, communication, and share issues services.
Label: No; 
Description: Propstep is an end-to-end platform for long-term rentals
Label: Yes; 
Description: DRIVE beta is a media production company that produces and develops video content on the web, moving images, and content distribution.
Label: No; 
Description: Developer of a business productivity software intended to provide supply chain management. The company's platform is specialized in offering a B2B marketplace for the manufacturing and industrial sector that can save time and money by optimizing their entire procurement operations, enabling clients to solve complex business problem through their software.
Label: Yes; 
Description: Spruce Up is a digital boutique powered by AI that curates a personalized boutique of high-quality, everyday luxury items for your home.
Label: No

Description: SpotMe is an online marketplace that connects unused space with people in need of storage.

Demand for storage has never been higher in LATAM and supply is limited. We're on a mission to sustainably solve the space needs of individuals, vehicles, and businesses. 

Our platform enables renters to solve their storage problems while at the same time allowing our hosts to earn extra income from their unused spaces. By leveraging technology, SpotMe is a one-stop shop where users can find more affordable, convenient, and secure storage solutions.
Label: Yes

Description: Software Product Design + Delivery

We've built software in every category—from consumer mobile apps to mission-critical enterprise systems for the largest financial services companies in the world. And everything in between. 

Whether you need to create your first product, scale existing applications to the next level, or modernize or add capability to legacy apps, we have the experience that will help you get there quickly.

We’ve designed the process and culture from the ground up to embrace geographically-distributed remote-first employees, and to recruit and retain diverse teams.

Description: Elda Health is a digital wellness platform that understands and stands for women , globally . Elda offers holistic mid-life and wellness solutions through physical, mental, medical, and social interventions. From menstruation to menopause: we believe in a “you first” approach. 

We work hand-in-glove with a community of women who grow together, and encourage them in their journey of self-care and wellbeing. 

At Elda, we create a positive sense of self.

Women should feel empowered, making strides in all walks of life. 
Supporting wellness through mindful initiatives, led by our expert panel of doctors, programs are designed to provide undivided attention to women and mid-life care, globally.
Label: Yes

Description: Vegetable oils (aka seed oils) are a big problem. They make up 20% of our daily calories and have been linked to widespread health and environmental issues. We’re here to change that. 

Our mission is to replace destructive vegetable oils used in our favorite restaurants and home kitchens. 

Seed oils are hidden in everything, from salad dressings and condiments, to fast food and Michelin-starred restaurants. Vegetable oils have been linked to weight gain, diabetes, cancer, cognitive decline, heart disease, autoimmune disease, and are a leading cause of deforestation and climate change. 

Zero Acre Farms is fixing one of the most problematic parts of our food system by introducing Zero Acre oil, a cleaner all-purpose cooking oil - with even more good fats than olive oil, a neutral taste, high smoke point and a smaller environmental footprint. Foods that are clean-fried in Zero Acre oil (not seed oils) have a delicious crisp taste with less greasiness, more heart-healthy fats and the lowest environmental impact compared to other cooking oils. Finally, restaurant and home kitchens have a replacement that offers the same versatility as vegetable oils without the health and environmental drawbacks.

As a team of food lovers, nutritionists, medical professionals, scientists and Michelin-starred chefs, we’re banding together to save our health and planet without sacrificing the foods we love. 

We’re giving the world a much needed oil change, will you join us?
Label: Yes

Description: 9am enables smooth collaboration between freelancers and companies. It's a freelancer management system and the biggest marketplace for freelance talents in Germany.

For freelancers, 9am provides the easiest way to get more and better projects. Talents can keep high-quality professional profiles updated and attract potential clients. Our contact funnel helps them to never forget about a lead again. But 9am doesn't stop there, and also brings joy to all admin, legal and payment topics. In our community, freelancers can connect with others and find help or inspiration.

For companies, it becomes easy to find the right talent at the right time. 9am gives them access to the biggest freelancer databases in Europe. The assessment and selection of the right talent becomes super easy, while all compliance and legal topics are taken care of. 9am helps HR, purchasing and team leads work together to create better and more resilient companies.
Label: Yes

TapWyse specializes in crafting striking, branded mobile apps tailored exclusively for breweries and taprooms. Our cutting-edge solutions empower you to create lasting connections with your patrons, enhancing engagement and driving repeat business.

🎁 Reward Loyalty: Our advanced Rewards feature enables you to effortlessly manage loyalty programs, transforming occasional visitors into loyal regulars.

💬 Engage Effectively: Pop-Up notifications ensure that your latest announcements and updates capture immediate attention, fostering a sense of community and excitement among your clientele.

🖥️ Simplified Management: Take control of your app's content and promotions through our intuitive online dashboard, allowing you to make real-time edits effortlessly.

Discover how TapWyse can help you amplify your brewery or taproom business in the digital age. Let's raise a virtual toast to innovation and customer satisfaction! Connect with us today to learn more. 🌟🍺 #TapWyse #BreweryInnovation #MobileAppSolutions

Our inhouse technology and expertise breaks silos which limit access to the best financial advice.

We are waiting to serve you.
